title: F.A. Cup Final 1954
brief_description: The Football Association Challenge Cup final, 1954, between Preston North End and West Bromwich Albion, played at the Empire Stadium, Wembley. Shows the huge crowds, highlights of the game, and the presentation of the Cup by Queen Elizabeth, the Queen Mother.
